component.name: Dune Dynasty
component.summary: Remaster/Enhancement of the classic real-time strategy game Dune II by Westwood Studios

description.p: The goal of Dune Dynasty is is to make Dune II playable on modern systems with additional features, bugfixes and QoL-improvements.
It is not a remake. It builds upon the original game engine as reverse-engineered by the OpenDUNE project.
NOTE: Original Dune II game files are required.

ul.li: Support for modern operating systems (Windows, Linux, MacOS)
High-resolution widescreen graphics & customizable scaling of for HiDPI displays
Control Enhancements like scrollable sidepanel, building queue, selecting/commanding multiple units, control groups,etc.
Skirmish & Multiplayer for up to 6 players/AI with custom teams
Music Enhancements: Emulated AdLib, MIDI (via system or FluidSynth), external music sets (e.g. for Sega Mega Drive / Amiga music, other Dune games or movies)
Gameplay Enhancements: Health bar, Fog of war, raised structure and unit limits, start level selection and many more.
Support for various custom campaigns made by the community

screenshot.caption: Multiplayer lobby for up to 6 players/AI and teams
Jukebox for songs and support for external music packs
